long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Your personal Google Business Profile tool that works on the browser. You will now be able to see Google My Business categories, do basic audits, do Review audits, do Post audits, check location ranking and many related GMB audits directly on Google itself. Now you can turbo charge your Google Business listing, GMB spy on your competitor, get google business analytics and win on Local SEO. 

üöÄ How to use it? 
- Install the extension from this page.
- Go to Google, and you will see the GMB categories and audit buttons shown on every business page and search result page by default. It also works on Google, Local finder and Google Search result pages.

üöÄ About us?
GMB Everywhere is a extension that lets you view Google My Business categories. We let you spy on your Google Business competitor and rank better on Local SEO. 

* Please note that we do not allow users to export data from GM. We have no such features.

üöÄ Our features?
Design and value to the customer is the number one parameter we aim for when we get our extension in public. Local SEO ranking can make or break your GMB listing. At present extension features includes. 

 ‚≠êGMB Categories: 
The categories you assign to your Google listing is one of the top parameter when it comes to Google map business ranking. With our extension you can see the categories directly. The pages it shows up include: 

- Google Business Page
- Google Search Result Page
- Google Business Page with bottom selector. 
- Local Finder Page 
- Local Finder Search Result Page

These categories automatically updates as you move from one page to another on these GMB resources above. 

 ‚≠êHighlighting categories: 
Among the categories that you assign to your business, it is the primary category that is the primary mover. It makes the difference between being on the 3 pack or in the bottom. 

Our extension marks the primary category with a '‚≠ê'. This way you can ideally differentiate between what is shown as the main category on google and what is the primary category. Unlike commonly believed, the default category shown is not always the primary category.

 ‚≠êBasic GMB Audit:
 This will allow you to do a basic audit on the business. This will give you a ton of details about the business. This includes: 
- Business claimed status.
- Location information.
- Place ID
- CID
- Business Profile Id
- Knowledge Panel Link
- GMB Review Request Link
- GMB Review Display Link
- Post Link
- Other businesses at the same address
- Other businesses using the same website
- Many website auditing shortcuts. 

‚≠êTeleport:
You local ranking is very much dependent on the location from which your customer is searching. With our Teleport feature, you can now simulate a search from a particular location. The features include: 
- Adding a term and select and location and find the rank at the particular location. 
- Get the competition you have at that particular location. 
- You can draw and calculate the distance of your business from that particular location directly. 

‚≠êGMB Review Audit:
Quantity and quality of reviews are a very important parameter in GMB ranking. With this business review analysis, you would get vital information about the health of the GMB reviews. With this feature, you can find the following information about reviews: 
- Graphical representation of reviews with time. 
- Calculating rating of the reviews. 
- Get analysis of content of their reviews. 
- Get analysis of quality of their reviews.
- Get valuable information about the strategy you would need to follow to be effective. 

‚≠êGMB Post Audit:
This feature will let you analyze the posts of a business on GMB. This uses the latest public data. This will give you a very accurate sense of the health of the posting frequency and other GMB Post parameters. With this feature, you can find the following information about posts:
- Graphical representation of their post strategy. 
- Post frequency analysis. 
- Post content analysis. 
- Get valuable information about strategy you would need to follow to be effective. 

‚≠êCategory Finder:
This feature will allow you to find the most relevant category and services for your business. This includes: 
- Find related category by providing a category. 
- Find search traffic associated with that category. 
- Find services associated with a category.
- Shortcut to compare seasonal change in category search with external tool.

‚≠êOther features:
- Transparent description about how we calculate data. 
- Show all the result in M Search, Google and Google Local Finder.

üöÄ Some things to note:
‚≠ê We are not related to Keyword Everywhere, Keyword Surfer or PlePer. This extension can be used in addition to these extensions on Google.
‚≠ê  We are also not related to GatherUp Google Review Link Generator or UberSuggest. They are just external links given in the audit result.
‚≠ê  This is an independent extension that works on Google resources. 

üöÄ Contact us:
In you have any questions, you can contact us using the chat option on the bottom right of www.gmbeverywhere.com. 

Would love to hear feedback.

‚≠ê Keyword Surfer: GMB Everywhere works excellently with Keyword Surfer, simplifying the analysis of keyword trends and search volumes. By integrating with Keyword Surfer, our extension enables enhanced keyword research and analysis, which is essential for efficient SEO strategies.

üöÄ About us?

* Please note that we do not allow users to export data from Google M. We have no such features.

üöÄ Our features?
Design and value to the customer is the number one parameter we aim for when we get our extension in public. Local SEO ranking can make or break your GMB listing. At present extension features includes. 

 ‚≠êGMB Categories: 
The categories you assign to your Google listing is one of the top parameter when it comes to Google map business ranking. With our extension you can see the categories directly on M and Local Finder. The pages it shows up include: 

- Google Business Page
- Google Search Result Page
- Google Business Page with bottom selector. 
- Local Finder Page 
- Local Finder Search Result Page

These categories automatically updates as you move from one page to another on these GMB resources above. 

 ‚≠êHighlighting categories: 
Among the categories that you assign to your business, it is the primary category that is the primary mover. It makes the difference between being on the 3 pack or in the bottom. 

Our extension marks the primary category with a '‚≠ê'. This way you can ideally differentiate between what is shown as the main category on google and what is the primary category. Unlike commonly believed, the default category shown is not always the primary category.

 ‚≠êBasic GMB Audit:
 This will allow you to do a basic audit on the business. This will give you a ton of details about the business. This includes: 
- Business claimed status.
- Location information.
- Place ID
- CID
- Business Profile Id
- Knowledge Panel Link
- GMB Review Request Link
- GMB Review Display Link
- Post Link
- Other businesses at the same address
- Other businesses using the same website
- Many website auditing shortcuts. 

‚≠êTeleport:
You local ranking is very much dependent on the location from which your customer is searching. With our Teleport feature, you can now simulate a search from a particular location. The features include: 
- Adding a term and select and location and find the rank at the particular location. 
- Get the competition you have at that particular location. 
- You can draw and calculate the distance of your business from that particular location directly. 

‚≠êGMB Review Audit:
Quantity and quality of reviews are a very important parameter in GMB ranking. With this business review analysis, you would get vital information about the health of the GMB reviews. With this feature, you can find the following information about reviews: 
- Graphical representation of reviews with time. 
- Calculating rating of the reviews. 
- Get analysis of content of their reviews. 
- Get analysis of quality of their reviews.
- Get valuable information about the strategy you would need to follow to be effective. 

‚≠êGMB Post Audit:

- Graphical representation of their post strategy. 
- Post frequency analysis. 
- Post content analysis. 
- Get valuable information about strategy you would need to follow to be effective. 

‚≠êCategory Finder:

- Find related category by providing a category. 
- Find search traffic associated with that category. 
- Find services associated with a category.

- Show all the result in M Search, Google and Google Local Finder.

Translate to English:
Find GMB categories, GMB Audits, Review audit, and Post audit. Spy, audit, and crush your GMB competitor with this Local SEO tool.

With this tool, you will now be able to find Google My Business categories, do basic audits, do Review audits, do Post audits, check location ranking and many related GMB audits directly on Google itself. Now you can turbo charge your Google Business listing, GMB spy on your competitor, get google business analytics and win on Local SEO. 

üöÄ How to use it? 
- Install the extension from this page.
- Go to Google, and you will see the GMB categories and audit buttons shown on every business page and search result page by default. It also works on Google, Local finder and Google Search result pages.

üöÄ About us?
GMB Everywhere is an extension that lets you view Google My Business categories on m. We let you spy on your Google Business competitor and rank better on Local SEO. 

* Please note that we do not allow users to export data from Google M. We have no such features.

üöÄ Our features?
Our extension, designed with a focus on customer value, offers a suite of features to enhance your GMB listing's local SEO ranking. Key features include:

GMB Categories: View your Google listing categories directly on M and Local Finder, including on Google Business Pages and Search Result Pages. These categories update automatically as you navigate through various GMB resources.

Category Finder: Find the most relevant categories and services for your business, along with search traffic and services associated with each category. Also, compare seasonal changes in category searches.

Highlighting Categories: Our extension uniquely marks the primary category with a '‚≠ê', helping distinguish the main category shown on Google from the actual primary category.

Basic GMB Audit: Conduct basic business audits to gather extensive details including claimed status, location, Place ID, CID, and links to Business Profile, GMB Review, and Posts. It also identifies businesses sharing the same address or website.

Teleport: Enhance your local ranking by simulating searches from specific locations, understanding local competition, and calculating distances from your business to these locations.

GMB Review and Post Audits: Analyze the health of GMB reviews and posting strategies using graphical representations, content analysis, and frequency assessments, providing insights for effective strategy formulation.

Additionally, our extension offers transparency in data calculations and displays results across M Search, Google, and Google Local Finder. This comprehensive approach ensures your GMB listing is optimized for peak performance in local SEO.

üöÄ Some things to note:
‚≠ê We are not related to Keyword Everywhere, Keyword Surfer or PlePer. This extension can be used in addition to these extensions on Google.
‚≠ê  We are also not related to GatherUp Google Review Link Generator or UberSuggest. They are just external links given in the audit result.
‚≠ê  This is an independent extension that works on M and other Google resources. 

üöÄ Cross Compatibility with SEO Tools:
We have tested the tool for cross compatibility with these common Local SEO tool. 

‚≠ê Similarweb - Traffic Rank & Website Analysis: Similarweb extension provides in-depth insights into website traffic and performance. By analyzing traffic sources, geographic data, and visitor behavior, Similarweb helps businesses understand their market position and discover growth opportunities. The Similarweb extension is essential for marketers and analysts looking to gain a competitive edge through detailed web analytics.

‚≠ê SEOquake: SEOquake is a versatile SEO tool available as a browser extension, offering immediate access to key SEO metrics, comprehensive SERP analysis, and website audits. With SEOquake, users can effortlessly evaluate both their own and competitors' websites, enhancing SEO strategies and improving page rankings. SEOquake serves as a critical tool for SEO professionals and webmasters seeking detailed insights directly from their browser.

‚≠ê Ahrefs SEO Toolbar: The Ahrefs SEO Toolbar extension brings the power of Ahrefs' SEO analysis and backlink checking to your browser. This tool provides instant visibility into website health, backlink profiles, and in-depth page analysis. The Ahrefs SEO Toolbar is perfect for SEO specialists and digital marketers who need on-the-go access to Ahrefs' trusted data for on-page SEO and SERP analysis.

‚≠ê Serpstat: Serpstat extension is a comprehensive SEO platform that offers keyword research, competitor analysis, and site auditing directly within your browser. With Serpstat, digital marketers and SEO professionals can access valuable data on search queries, optimize their web content, and track their rankings effortlessly. The Serpstat extension is a powerful tool for anyone looking to streamline their SEO and PPC efforts with actionable insights.

‚≠ê BuzzSumo: BuzzSumo extension is a content discovery and performance analysis tool that allows users to identify trending topics, monitor content engagement, and analyze what content performs best for any topic or competitor. BuzzSumo is an essential tool for content marketers, social media managers, and publishers seeking to create high-performing content. With the BuzzSumo extension, finding and analyzing top content across the web becomes seamless.

‚≠ê Pagespeed Insights: Pagespeed Insights by Google is a tool that analyzes the performance of web pages and suggests ways to improve them for a better user experience. By using the Pagespeed Insights extension, web developers and site owners can quickly assess their site's speed and usability, receiving actionable recommendations for optimization. The Pagespeed Insights extension is crucial for maintaining fast, efficient, and user-friendly websites.

‚≠ê SEOQuake: SEOQuake is a powerful SEO toolbox that offers on-demand access to an array of SEO metrics, detailed reports, and SERP analysis. This extension is designed to provide SEO professionals, webmasters, and digital marketers with comprehensive data on web page health, social metrics, and more. SEOQuake facilitates a deeper understanding of website performance and the competitive landscape.

‚≠ê Fatrank: Fatrank extension is a user-friendly tool for checking the Google ranking of websites for specific keywords. It allows users to easily ascertain how well a website performs in search engine results pages (SERPs) for targeted keywords. Fatrank is an invaluable resource for SEO professionals and website owners focused on tracking their search engine rankings and optimizing their keyword strategies.

This added section emphasizes the versatility and compatibility of GMB Everywhere, enhancing its appeal to users who are already utilizing these popular SEO tools.

üöÄ Contact us:
In you have any questions, you can contact us using the chat option on the bottom right of www.gmbeverywhere.com. 

Would love to hear feedback.

Translation in English: 
Find GMB categories, GMB Audits, Review audit, and Post audit. Spy, audit, and crush your GMB competitor with this Local SEO tool.

With this tool, you will now be able to find Google My Business categories, do basic audits, do Review audits, do Post audits, check location ranking and many related GMB audits directly on Google itself. Now you can turbo charge your Google Business listing, GMB spy on your competitor, get google business analytics and win on Local SEO. 

üöÄ How to use it? 
- Install the extension from this page.
- Go to Google, and you will see the GMB categories and audit buttons shown on every business page and search result page by default. It also works on Google, Local finder and Google Search result pages.

üöÄ About us?
GMB Everywhere is an extension that lets you view Google My Business categories on m. We let you spy on your Google Business competitor and rank better on Local SEO. 

* Please note that we do not allow users to export data from Google M. We have no such features.

üöÄ Our features?
Our extension, designed with a focus on customer value, offers a suite of features to enhance your GMB listing's local SEO ranking. Key features include:

GMB Categories: View your Google listing categories directly on M and Local Finder, including on Google Business Pages and Search Result Pages. These categories update automatically as you navigate through various GMB resources.

Category Finder: Find the most relevant categories and services for your business, along with search traffic and services associated with each category. Also, compare seasonal changes in category searches.

Highlighting Categories: Our extension uniquely marks the primary category with a '‚≠ê', helping distinguish the main category shown on Google from the actual primary category.

Basic GMB Audit: Conduct basic business audits to gather extensive details including claimed status, location, Place ID, CID, and links to Business Profile, GMB Review, and Posts. It also identifies businesses sharing the same address or website.

Teleport: Enhance your local ranking by simulating searches from specific locations, understanding local competition, and calculating distances from your business to these locations.

GMB Review and Post Audits: Analyze the health of GMB reviews and posting strategies using graphical representations, content analysis, and frequency assessments, providing insights for effective strategy formulation.

Additionally, our extension offers transparency in data calculations and displays results across M Search, Google, and Google Local Finder. This comprehensive approach ensures your GMB listing is optimized for peak performance in local SEO.

üöÄ Some things to note:
‚≠ê We are not related to Keyword Everywhere, Keyword Surfer or PlePer. This extension can be used in addition to these extensions on Google.
‚≠ê  We are also not related to GatherUp Google Review Link Generator or UberSuggest. They are just external links given in the audit result.
‚≠ê  This is an independent extension that works on M and other Google resources. 

üöÄ Cross Compatibility with SEO Tools:
We have tested the tool for cross compatibility with these common Local SEO tool. 

‚≠ê Similarweb - Traffic Rank & Website Analysis: Similarweb extension provides in-depth insights into website traffic and performance. By analyzing traffic sources, geographic data, and visitor behavior, Similarweb helps businesses understand their market position and discover growth opportunities. The Similarweb extension is essential for marketers and analysts looking to gain a competitive edge through detailed web analytics.

‚≠ê SEOquake: SEOquake is a versatile SEO tool available as a browser extension, offering immediate access to key SEO metrics, comprehensive SERP analysis, and website audits. With SEOquake, users can effortlessly evaluate both their own and competitors' websites, enhancing SEO strategies and improving page rankings. SEOquake serves as a critical tool for SEO professionals and webmasters seeking detailed insights directly from their browser.

‚≠ê Ahrefs SEO Toolbar: The Ahrefs SEO Toolbar extension brings the power of Ahrefs' SEO analysis and backlink checking to your browser. This tool provides instant visibility into website health, backlink profiles, and in-depth page analysis. The Ahrefs SEO Toolbar is perfect for SEO specialists and digital marketers who need on-the-go access to Ahrefs' trusted data for on-page SEO and SERP analysis.

‚≠ê Serpstat: Serpstat extension is a comprehensive SEO platform that offers keyword research, competitor analysis, and site auditing directly within your browser. With Serpstat, digital marketers and SEO professionals can access valuable data on search queries, optimize their web content, and track their rankings effortlessly. The Serpstat extension is a powerful tool for anyone looking to streamline their SEO and PPC efforts with actionable insights.

‚≠ê BuzzSumo: BuzzSumo extension is a content discovery and performance analysis tool that allows users to identify trending topics, monitor content engagement, and analyze what content performs best for any topic or competitor. BuzzSumo is an essential tool for content marketers, social media managers, and publishers seeking to create high-performing content. With the BuzzSumo extension, finding and analyzing top content across the web becomes seamless.

‚≠ê Pagespeed Insights: Pagespeed Insights by Google is a tool that analyzes the performance of web pages and suggests ways to improve them for a better user experience. By using the Pagespeed Insights extension, web developers and site owners can quickly assess their site's speed and usability, receiving actionable recommendations for optimization. The Pagespeed Insights extension is crucial for maintaining fast, efficient, and user-friendly websites.

‚≠ê SEOQuake: SEOQuake is a powerful SEO toolbox that offers on-demand access to an array of SEO metrics, detailed reports, and SERP analysis. This extension is designed to provide SEO professionals, webmasters, and digital marketers with comprehensive data on web page health, social metrics, and more. SEOQuake facilitates a deeper understanding of website performance and the competitive landscape.

‚≠ê Fatrank: Fatrank extension is a user-friendly tool for checking the Google ranking of websites for specific keywords. It allows users to easily ascertain how well a website performs in search engine results pages (SERPs) for targeted keywords. Fatrank is an invaluable resource for SEO professionals and website owners focused on tracking their search engine rankings and optimizing their keyword strategies.

This added section emphasizes the versatility and compatibility of GMB Everywhere, enhancing its appeal to users who are already utilizing these popular SEO tools.
